addressCountry.description: The country. Recommended to be in 2-letter [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1) format, for example "US". For backward compatibility, a 3-letter [ISO 3166-1 alpha-3](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-3) country code such as "SGP" or a full country name such as "Singapore" can also be used.

addressLocality.description: The locality in which the street address is, and which is in the region. For example, Mountain View.

addressRegion.description: The region in which the locality is, and which is in the country. For example, California or another appropriate first-level [Administrative division](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_administrative_divisions_by_country).

extendedAddress.description: An address extension such as an apartment number, C/O or alternative name.

postOfficeBoxNumber.description: The post office box number for PO box addresses.

streetAddress.description: The street address. For example, 1600 Amphitheatre Pkwy.
